Desc.eng: Thank you, hunter! So I guess our friend made it safely to the Old Town.
Your friend? I have no idea what you are talking about. We only found you by sheer luck.
Please don’t tell me that we have to go back and rescue someone else too.
No, no. You helped us tremendously. We’ll deal with this.
Yes. He is fine. He must be in the Secret Lair by now. You should go after him.
Definitely. We are getting close to the Professor. It might get… a bit messy around here.
